attributes.action: Petition a vote of NO confidence in Jeremy Corbyn. Demand his resignation.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn has shown time and time again that he is not fit to lead the Labour party. He has single handedly betrayed both labour voters and Remain voters in the recent referendum. He is a liability and unfit to hold the post of leader of the Labour party. We support a vote of NO confidence.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
